EmailTemplate.name: ENSI eLearning Status
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI eLearning status Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.NAM_Name__c}
As you may recall all ENSI programs include access to our online reinforcement module for a period of 6 months from the conclusion of your program.
To date, X of X participants from your {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} program have accessed the module.
To guarantee the best return on your investment we encourage you to promote this resource to your group.
Donâ€™t hesitate to contact me if you would like further information.
Regards
